defendant_name.name: Hong Ka-ming
defendant_name.source: Case heading and transcript: 'Hong Ka-ming (康家銘) (A2)'

age_at_offence.source: Transcript: 'In respect of the 2nd defendant, he is now 36 years of age. He was 34 years old at the time of the offence.'

age_at_sentencing.source: Transcript: 'In respect of the 2nd defendant, he is now 36 years of age.'

marital_status.source: Transcript: 'He was single and worked as a hairdresser.'

conditions.source: Transcript: 'he has a long history of mental illness. He first received psychiatric treatment at the age of 11 and there were multiple psychiatric admissions to various hospitals between year 2009 to 2022.'

Transcript: 'I noted from various psychiatric reports ... part of the condition of the 2nd defendant was a result of his own drug abuse. In any event, counsel informed me that he is now clear of the drug usage.'

criminal_record.source: Transcript: 'He has a total of five criminal convictions including two convictions for the offence of possession of dangerous drug and one conviction for possession of pipe or equipment fit and intended for the consumption of dangerous drug.'

family_support.source: Transcript: 'A total of three mitigation letters respectively prepared by the mother, a friend of the 2nd defendant and also by a pastor were submitted to urge for leniency.'
